attributes.action: MPs please unite and work together
attributes.additional_details:
MPs - please don't let internal party politics and disagreements get in the way, this is more than individual parties now - the most important thing is to work together to unite an angry & divided country. You were elected to represent us all.

16,141,241 voted to remain
17,410,742 voted to leave
There was a difference of 1,269,501 between the two "sides" (0.04% of the people who voted, 0.03% of the total electorate) - this is a tiny %, please ensure all are listened to as we move forward.
attributes.background: The EU referendum has lead to a more divided country than ever before & a huge amount of emotion & anger. This is to urge MPs & our citizens to stand back, try to understand where others are coming from & work together. Please work together for the sake of the future of the UK, EU & all citizens.
